title: Ozma
description: A land to remake...He believed his lover dead. She’s the true Queen of Oz. Together they will fight through the darkness.Ozma’s life has never been her own. Stolen, spelled, and enslaved by a witch, she never imagined she could be the true Queen of Oz. Now that she has broken her curse and returned to Oz, she vows to kill the the fae who held her captive. But first, she seeks to reunite with her lover, Jack.Jack, too, was stolen as a child, and forced to toil as the witch’s slave. When he’s told that his lover died, Jack resigns himself to a miserable life. His only solace is an array of lustful companions that remind him of the one he lost.The happily ever after Ozma hoped for vanishes when she discovers Jack isn’t who he once was. But neither is she. And the secrets she keeps could bring them closer or break them apart.For good.Ozma is the third companion book in this dark fantasy romance series. If you love sexy fae and second chance romances, then you won't want to skip this one.
author: Candace Robinson
